member.name: T:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider

summary.vsli:raw: Provides access to an encoding provider for code pages that otherwise are available only in the desktop .NET Framework.

member.summary: 將字碼頁存取權提供給編碼提供者，否則只能在桌面 .NET Framework 中使用。

member.name: M:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider.GetEncoding(System.Int32)

summary.vsli:raw: Returns the encoding associated with the specified code page identifier.

member.summary: 傳回與指定字碼頁識別項相關聯的編碼方式。

param.name: codepage
param.vsli:raw: The code page identifier of the preferred encoding which the encoding provider may support.

member.param: 編碼提供者可能支援的慣用編碼字碼頁識別碼。

returns.vsli:raw: The encoding associated with the specified code page identifier, or <see langword="null" /> if the provider does not support the requested codepage encoding.

member.returns: 與指定字碼頁識別碼建立關聯的編碼方式；如果提供者不支援所要求的字碼頁編碼，則為 。

member.name: M:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider.GetEncoding(System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Returns the encoding associated with the specified code page name.

member.summary: 傳回與指定字碼頁名稱相關聯的編碼方式。

param.name: name
param.vsli:raw: The code page name of the preferred encoding which the encoding provider may support.

member.param: 編碼提供者可能支援的慣用編碼字碼頁名稱。

returns.vsli:raw: The encoding associated with the specified code page, or <see langword="null" /> if the provider does not support the requested encoding.

member.returns: 與指定字碼頁建立關聯的編碼方式；如果提供者不支援所要求的編碼，則為 。

member.name: P:System.Text.CodePagesEncodingProvider.Instance

summary.vsli:raw: Gets an encoding provider for code pages supported in the desktop .NET Framework but not in the current .NET Framework platform.

member.summary: 針對桌面 .NET Framework 所支援但目前 .NET Framework 平台不支援的字碼頁，取得其編碼提供者。

returns.vsli:raw: An encoding provider that allows access to encodings not supported on the current .NET Framework platform.

member.returns: 編碼提供者，允許存取目前 .NET Framework 平臺上不支援的編碼。
